explore ⇣

seascape models

Welcome to the page of Chris Brown's lab group at Griffith University. We help data tell stories about more effective environmental decisions. We do this by bringing ecological complexity to the planning tools used to inform decisions.

Read more about our research, R coding tools, skip straight to Chris' blog, or contact us.
